basics.name: Rajalakshmi Venkatramani
basics.label: Senior Executive Human Resources
basics.summary:
Experienced Human Resource skilled in Recruitment, Administration, Performance Management & Payroll.
Goals: Want to work in an organization where I get opportunity to groom & nurture myself. I want to work in an organization by integrating my goals with the organizational goal by using win - win strategy
Specialties: Strong in communication, good in interpersonal relationship and overall knowledge in HR

work.summary: Handling Recruitment, New Joinee Formalities Tasks, Employee Confirmation Tasks, Training Tasks, Leave Maintenance, Payroll, Attendance, Grievance Handling, Performance appraisal, Employee Communication & Exit formalities

Sourcing and Recruiting for  IT and Non IT requirements in US Market. 
Get potential candidates based on client's requirements.
Interacting with potential candidates on social media and professional networks 
Strong experience in handling Job Portals (Eg., Monster, Dice & Career Builder)
Strong experience in handling passive job portals (Eg., LinkedIn, Indeed, etc.,)
Having knowledge in Lead generation

Handling a team which includes 5-6 members
Handling IT and Non IT requirements in US Market. 
Get potential candidates based on client's requirements.
Strong experience in handling Job Portals (Eg., Monster, Dice & Career Builder)
Strong experience in handling passive job portals (Eg., LinkedIn, Indeed, etc.,)
Maintain qualitative team work
Client Coversion.

Handling IT and Non IT requirements in US Market. 
Get potential candidates based on client's requirements.
Strong experience in handling Job Portals (Eg., Monster, Dice & Career Builder)
Strong experience in handling passive job portals (Eg., LinkedIn, Indeed, etc.,)

Sourcing profiles from different job portals (Monster, Dice, Times job, LinkedIn & Reference), Screening the suitable profiles, Shortlisting the exact matches, Client Submissions, Interact with clients. Recruiting candidates for top IT MNCs in India
